Burnley secured an immediate return to the Premier League as they earned automatic promotion with a 2-1 victory against Middlesbrough on Friday.
Vincent Kompany's side sealed their return to England… [+2064 chars]

articles.author: Sam Marsden
articles.title: What's going on at Barcelona? LaLiga leaders in turmoil - ESPN India
articles.description: Barcelona are impressive in LaLiga but are out of Europe and were thrashed by Real Madrid. Oh, and they're in off-pitch turmoil. What's going on?
articles.content: Football has a short memory. Barcelona's three successive Clasico wins were quickly forgotten on Wednesday as they were blown away by Real Madrid in the Copa del Rey semifinal second leg. A second ha… [+10922 chars]

articles.author: Shubhi Mishra
articles.title: Rajasthan Royals' Joe Root and Yuzvendra Chahal's killer dance moves to Biba has left the Internet wanting for more - India Today
articles.description: A video of Joe Root and Yuzvendra Chahal dancing to the catchy beats of the popular song Biba has gone viral online. The clip was shared on Twitter by the official page of Rajasthan Royals.
articles.content: By Shubhi Mishra: If you are looking for something to cheer you up and get you into the Friday mood, we have the perfect video for you. So, a clip of Joe Root and Yuzvendra Chahal dancing and setting… [+1693 chars]
